instanceFields.label: AttachedArticulationBody
instanceFields.description: The transform of the rigidbody this collider is attached to.

instanceFields.label: ContactOffset
instanceFields.description: The contact offset used by the collider to avoid tunneling.

instanceFields.label: ExcludeLayers
instanceFields.description: The layers that this Collider should exclude when deciding if the Collider can contact another Collider.

instanceFields.label: IncludeLayers
instanceFields.description: The additional layers that this Collider should include when deciding if the Collider can contact another Collider.

instanceFields.label: IsTrigger
instanceFields.description: Whether the collider is a trigger. Triggers don't cause physical collisions.

instanceFields.label: Center
instanceFields.description: The center of the collider's bounding box in world space.

instanceFields.label: ProvidesContacts
instanceFields.description: Whether the collider provides contact information.

instanceFields.label: MaterialName
instanceFields.description: The name of the physics material on the collider.

instanceFields.label: SharedMaterialName
instanceFields.description: The name of the shared physics material on this collider.

instanceFields.label: GameObjectTransform
instanceFields.description: The transform of the gameobject this collider is attached to.

instanceMethods.label: ClosestPoint
instanceMethods.description: Gets the closest point on the collider to the given position. Returns: The closest point on the collider.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position to find the closest point to.

instanceMethods.label: ClosestPointOnBounds
instanceMethods.description: Gets the closest point on the collider's bounding box to the given position. Returns: The closest point on the bounding box.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position to find the closest point on bounds to.

instanceMethods.label: Raycast
instanceMethods.description: Runs a raycast physics check between start to end and checks if it hits any collider with the given collideWith layer. Returns: A LineCastHitResult if it hit something, otherwise returns null.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start position of the raycast.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end position of the raycast.

parameters.name: collideWith
parameters.description: The layer name to check collisions with. Refer to CollideWithEnum
